TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Quaternion extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.Numerics.Quaternion>
Public Structure Quaternion Implements IEquatable(Of Quaternion)

Docs.summary: Represents a vector that is used to encode three-dimensional physical rotations.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion> structure is used to efficiently rotate an object about the (x,y,z) vector by the angle theta, where:
``` w = cos(theta/2) ```

Docs.summary: Creates a new object.

Docs.summary: Returns a string that represents this quaternion.
Docs.returns: The string representation of this quaternion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The numeric values in the returned string are formatted by using the conventions of the current culture. For example, for the en-US culture, the returned string might appear as `{X:1.1 Y:2.2 Z:3.3 W:4.4}`.
